items.typeLine: Dabbler's Topaz Flask of the Horsefly
explicitMods: 30% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
17% increased Cast Speed during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

implicitMods: Adds 2 to 11 Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: +1.8 metres to radius
You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 38% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +24 to Intelligence
25% increased Lightning Damage
40% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.
